fun.name: >8ball
fun.description: Ask the bot a question, (don't forget the question mark at the end!)

fun.name: >ramm / >rickandmortymeme
fun.description: Sends a Rick and Morty meme

fun2.name: >makebaby / >mb
fun2.description: Make a baby with another user

fun2.name: >sus <Mention the User>
fun2.description: Use this if a user is acting sus

fun2.name: >vc / virginitycheck
fun2.description: This one is pretty self explanatory

information.name: >botusers / >bu
information.description: Says the amount of users the bot has

information.name: >uptime
information.description: Shows the amount of time the bot's been online for

information.name: >ping
information.description: Displays the bot's pings in milliseconds

utilities.name: >message <the message you want to send>
utilities.description: Sends a message to the owner of the bot

utilities.name: >feature / >featurerequest / >fr
utilities.description: If you have any bot feature requests (commands) use this command, it will send the request to ShyGuy

utilities.name: >channeltopic / >ct
utilities.description: Sets the channel topic (You will require the manage channels permission)
